createLoginInfo: Sign up to get started with MelioraLab and start managing your health. We'll help you track your health and provide you with the best products to keep you healthy.

errors.password: At least 1 lowercase and uppercase letter, 1 number and symbol

risk.publicOrSharedDevice: Are you using a public or shared device?
risk.info: When this box is checked, we'll keep you signed in, making it easier to shop. You'll also be ready to check out if you've saved your payment details. You can always turn this feature off in My MelioraLab. We may ask you to sign in again for certain activities, such as making changes to your account.

changePhone.description: Enter your new phone number below.

success.title: Your phone number has been updated!

changeEmail.title: Change your email
changeEmail.description: Enter your new email address below.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.instructions: Please check the email address {{email}} for instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.resetTimer: You can request a new password reset in {{timeLeft}} seconds.

changePasswordError: There was a problem with changing your password
